comment.author: 78944683@N03
comment._content: Great photo, you caught a nice moment.

comment.author: 19114153@N06
comment._content: I see two possibilities. The first, and I think most likely, is aboard USS Rendova (CVE-114) either during carrier qualifications or a little later during Operation Lex Baker I in February 1952. The two HRS's on the right are HRS-1's - I can tell by where "MARINES" is located on the booms. The second HRS-1 on the right has the modex HS and what looks like a 5 or 6 on the nose. That makes it HMR-162 based at MCAF Santa Ana. The second possibility would be aboard USS Valley Forge (CV-45) during the PHIBEX I exercise during October 1952.
